name: Compactor escapor
description:
Being a cyborg bear is tough, not only do you have to escape being crushed to death by garbage compactors, you also have to watch out for strawberries jamming everything up!
Help  the bear escape the junkyard by reaching the exit before it's too late. Use the bear's magnetic arms to move blocks and build a tower to escape, but watch out for fruit!
Press the WASD keys to move around and left mouse button to drag blocks.

Made as a submission to curdle jam, theme "Clumping together".

Made by Team Tribunus Elit:
https://scyrus1321.itch.io/

https://dullios.itch.io/

https://cicero106.itch.io/

https://ophdev.itch.io/

https://chavafei.itch.io/
